So, my wife was harassed yesterday in flight while breastfeeding. The flight attendant offered her a blanket to cover up as another passenger had complained. My wife had on a proper nursing top and was showing very little in fact. After landing and when all other passengers were deplaned my wife and sister confronted same attendant wanting to know the airline's policy. At that point, another man approached(most likely an air marshal) to make sure no trouble was developing. He volunteered that my wife could have just used the restroom to breastfeed. Needless to say this ain't over by a longshot.
